}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== OEM [[Edimax EW-7108PCg v1]]
This item is probably identical to the [[Hawking HWC54D]]. This card was, however, targeted to Mac users.
"PN: 1244-00000365-010" is silkscreened on the board.
There is a higher gain antenna in this card connected to an internal U.FL connector.
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:Hawking HWC54DA top.jpg| File:Hawking HWC54DA bot.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]]
